note.p: Scottish tradesman. Employed by James Huie & Co. of Govan, curled hair manufacturer, 1871. Commission agent in London, 1881. Journalist from at least 1891.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/314/60/17), 1891 (RG12/195/112/6), 1911 (RG14/7344/141)
Census returns of Scotland 1871 (The National Archives of Scotland: Glasgow Govan 23/10/18)
